definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale

sentences.english: Writing is sort of making vintage wine, in which the spirit and mind become more and more abundant and deeper over time.
sentences.chinese: 寫作如同釀製陳年老窖，時間越長靈感越多越深邃。

sentences.english: This article will tell you how to decant aged wine.
sentences.chinese: 本文將告訴你陳年葡萄酒如何醒酒。

sentences.english: An ideal match for semi-hard or aged cheeses, or important and complex dishes of spiced red meat.
sentences.chinese: 理想搭配陳年奶酪，風味濃郁的菜餚以及辣味紅肉。

sentences.english: Grand wine for long ageing from a great Médoc vintage in all aspects.
sentences.chinese: 從任何角度欣賞都是一款很有陳年潛力的梅多克好酒。

sentences.english: Cellaring potential of at least 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 具備至少25年的陳年能力。

sentences.english: This well-integrated Bordeaux style wine will improve very nicely with a few years of aging.
sentences.chinese: 這款結合着波爾多風格的葡萄酒略加陳年會更加完美。

sentences.english: This phenomenon deeply stimulated the aged.
sentences.chinese: 這種現象深深地刺激了陳年。

sentences.english: The old chest exuded a smell of camphor.
sentences.chinese: 陳年抽屜放出樟腦氣味。

sentences.english: Temperamentally, like Hawthorne, he preferred a plot out of the past .
sentences.chinese: 在氣質上他像霍桑，喜歡陳年往事。

sentences.english: VANCL, founder of the aged by the Joyo founded in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 由卓越網的創始人陳年於2007年成立。

sentences.english: Wine cellar for many years daughter red, like the old friendship.
sentences.chinese: 酒是窖藏多年的女兒紅，像極了陳年的情意。

sentences.english: The daycoach was hot, full of the weary smell of old red plush .
sentences.chinese: 二等車廂非常悶熱，滿鼻子舊紅絨椅墊的陳年味道。

sentences.english: Light green-yellow when young, aging to a pale gold.
sentences.chinese: 此酒隨着陳年，顏色由淡淡的黃綠轉爲雅緻的金黃色。

sentences.english: Yquem has unbelievable aging potential. Because it is so rich, opulent and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 狄甘甜白酒豐富，濃郁具有驚人的陳年潛力。

sentences.english: Fresh cheese is not aged before eating.
sentences.chinese: 所謂新鮮乳酪，就是在食用前有別於陳年品種的乳酪。

sentences.english: She loaded up his collection of vintage wines into crates.
sentences.chinese: 她把他收藏的陳年佳釀裝進板條箱裏。

definition: to settle/to precipitate (solid sediment out of a solution)
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
